items.title: Eczema symptoms unchanged by daily or weekly bathing, study shows
items.description: A study has found that people with eczema are able to bathe either daily or weekly, without any impact on their symptoms.

items.title: Should kids be screened for high cholesterol genes? Study weighs costs and benefits
items.description: In the United States, 1 in every 250 people has inherited a genetic variant that leads to dangerously high cholesterol levels from birth.
